com.google.api.gax.retrying

Class RetryAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.api.gax.retrying.RetryAlgorithm

  • @BetaApi
public class RetryAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    The retry algorithm, which makes decision based on the thrown exception and execution time settings of the previous attempt.

    This class is thread-safe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RetryAlgorithm(ExceptionRetryAlgorithm exceptionAlgorithm, TimedRetryAlgorithm timedAlgorithm)
      Creates a new retry algorithm instance, which uses exceptionAlgorithm and timedAlgorithm to make a decision.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TimedAttemptSettings createFirstAttempt()
      Creates a first attempt TimedAttemptSettings.
      TimedAttemptSettings createNextAttempt(java.lang.Throwable prevThrowable, TimedAttemptSettings prevSettings)
      Creates a next attempt TimedAttemptSettings.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RetryAlgorithm

        public RetryAlgorithm(ExceptionRetryAlgorithm exceptionAlgorithm,
                      TimedRetryAlgorithm timedAlgorithm)
        Creates a new retry algorithm instance, which uses exceptionAlgorithm and timedAlgorithm to make a decision. exceptionAlgorithm has higher priority than the timedAlgorithm.
        Parameters:
        timedAlgorithm - timed algorithm to use
        exceptionAlgorithm - exception algorithm to use

    • Method Detail

      • createFirstAttempt

        public TimedAttemptSettings createFirstAttempt()
        Creates a first attempt TimedAttemptSettings.
        Returns:
        first attempt settings

      • createNextAttempt

        public TimedAttemptSettings createNextAttempt(java.lang.Throwable prevThrowable,
                                              TimedAttemptSettings prevSettings)
        Creates a next attempt TimedAttemptSettings. This method will return the exception-specific next attempt settings, if there are any, otherwise it will default to the time-specific settings.
        Parameters:
        prevThrowable - exception thrown by the previous attempt
        prevSettings - previous attempt settings
        Returns:
        next attempt settings
